name: Gravity Is Inevitable
description:
Gravity will be your downfall! You must delay the inevitable by making good use of your rope swing and striking abilities. Don't let anything get you down!

Controls:

Left click on a point to swing

Right click while swinging to strike

Credits:

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 50

Programmer/Game Designer/Artist

pixelbrain

Composer/Sound Designer

Sandro Gonçalves
